response.original_title: The Fight of Our Lives: Defeating the Ideological War Against the West
response.overview: The Fight of Our Lives - Defeating the Ideological War Against the West is a hard-hitting new documentary film by Gloria Z. Greenfield that examines the internal and external threats facing the West. "There are two threats facing the West, and they are linked. There's the threat from within, and the threat from without," states Melanie Phillips. "And the threat from without is made much more threatening by the threat from within."
response.title: The Fight of Our Lives: Defeating the Ideological War Against the West
